entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
